alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 10 at 2:55PM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MONDAY NIGHT TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches, with isolated amounts approaching 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascade, Fergus and Judith Basin Counties. * WHEN...From Midnight Monday Night to Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
